text: The 1975/76 NTFL season was the 55th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). Darwin have won there 20th premiership title while defeating the Nth. Darwin (Palmerston) Magpies in the grand final by 38 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | Darwin | 16.14 (110) - 11.6 (72) | Nth. Darwin (Palmerston) Magpies |} ==References== Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1975/76 NTFL season
